block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence N. Margel of Villanova, Pa., have announced the engagement of their daughter Beth Sharon Margel and David Raymond Dahle, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth J. Dahle of Cincinnati. An April wedding is planned. Miss Margel, 25 years old, and her fiance, 26, are graduates of Duke University. She is an employee-benefits consultant with Noble Lowndes, management consultants in Philadelphia. The prospective bridegroom is an insurance broker in Stamford, Conn., with Johnson & Higgins.

Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence N. Margel of Villanova, Pa., have announced the engagement of their daughter Beth Sharon Margel and David Raymond Dahle, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth J. Dahle of Cincinnati. An April wedding is planned. Miss Margel, 25 years old, and her fiance, 26, are graduates of Duke University. She is an employee-benefits consultant with Noble Lowndes, management consultants in Philadelphia. The prospective bridegroom is an insurance broker in Stamford, Conn., with Johnson & Higgins.
